code: @Manual{,   title = {Contoso Dataset},   author = {Alejandro Hagan},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.0.0},   url = {https://github.com/alejandrohagan/contoso}, }

title: Contoso Dataset
text: Contoso synthetic dataset containing sample sales transaction data fictional “Contoso” company. includes various supporting tables business intelligence, customer, store, product, currency exchange data. dataset perfect practicing time series analysis, financial modeling, business intelligence-related tasks. package comes following datasets: Contains information sales transactions, including total sales amount, customer, store, product involved. Contains details customers, customer key, name, address, demographic information. Contains information stores, including store key, name, location, related details. Contains information products, product key, name, category, price. Contains foreign exchange rate data, mapping currency pairs exchange rates specific dates. Contains date-related information, including date, week, month, quarter, year use time-based analysis. Contains information individual orders, including order key, customer key, order date, store information. Contains detailed line items order, including product key, quantity, price item order. Built package 10K row version dataset. want larger dataset, also 100K, 1M 10M can created create_contoso_duckdb() function. create local duckdb database attach specified row size version motherduck database local database. Using view, can see columns’ label using labelled package.1 data originally sourced sqlbi github site

title: Contoso Dataset
text: Example create duckdb database Contoso tables loaded :
code: library(contoso)  # Creates a list of DuckDB database containing Contoso datasets contoso_db <- create_contoso_duckdb(dir = "temp",size = "1m")  # Access the sales dataset from the database sales_data <- contoso_db$sales

title: Creates duckdb versions of Contoso datasets — create_contoso_duckdb
Creates duckdb versions of Contoso datasets — create_contoso_duckdb
text: db_dir "temp" "in_memory" size "100k","1M" "10M"

title: Creates duckdb versions of Contoso datasets — create_contoso_duckdb
text: list lazy `tbl` objects references Contoso datasets stored DuckDB database. list contains following tables: - `sales` - `product` - `customer` - `store` - `fx` - `store` - `orderrows` - `date`

title: Creates duckdb versions of Contoso datasets — create_contoso_duckdb
text: [create_contonso_duckdb] function registers following Contoso datasets DuckDB tables: - `sales`: Contains sales transaction data. - `product`: Contains details products, including attributes like product name, manufacturer, category. - `customer`: Contains customer demographic geographic information. - `store`: Contains information store locations attributes. - `fx`: Contains foreign exchange rate data currency conversion. - `date`: Contains various date-related information, including day, week, month, year. can choose store database memory temporary directory. choose "temp", database created temporary file disk. choose "in_memory", database created entirely memory discarded R session ends.

title: Creates duckdb versions of Contoso datasets — create_contoso_duckdb
code: # Create a DuckDB version of Contoso datasets stored in memory create_contoso_duckdb(db_dir = "in_memory",size="100K") #> Error in duckdb_result(connection = conn, stmt_lst = stmt_lst, arrow = arrow): Invalid Error: IO Error: Extension "/home/hagan/.local/share/R/duckdb/extensions/v1.4.1/linux_amd64/motherduck.duckdb_extension" not found. #> Extension "motherduck" is an existing extension. #>  #> Install it first using "INSTALL motherduck". #> ℹ Context: rapi_execute #> ℹ Error type: INVALID #> ℹ Raw message: IO Error: Extension "/home/hagan/.local/share/R/duckdb/extensions/v1.4.1/linux_amd64/motherduck.duckdb_extension" not found. #> Extension "motherduck" is an existing extension. #>  #> Install it first using "INSTALL motherduck".

what: Customer Data from the Contonso Dataset — customer
title: Customer Data from the Contonso Dataset — customer
text: dataset contains information customers Contonso dataset, including demographic details, geographical information, contact information, personal attributes. provides insights customer profiles, including location, age, occupation, .

title: Customer Data from the Contonso Dataset — customer
Customer Data from the Contonso Dataset — customer
text: data frame 23 columns: customer_key double Unique identifier customer. geo_area_key double Unique identifier geographical area customer resides . start_dt Date Date customer relationship began. end_dt Date Date customer relationship ended, applicable. continent character continent customer resides. gender character gender customer (e.g., 'Male', 'Female'). title character title customer (e.g., 'Mr.', 'Ms.'). given_name character given (first) name customer. middle_initial character middle initial customer, applicable. surname character surname (last name) customer. street_address character street address customer. city character city customer resides. state character state province customer resides. state_full character full name state province. zip_code character postal (ZIP) code customer's address. country character country customer resides, using country code. country_full character full name country customer resides. birthday Date date birth customer. age double age customer. occupation character customer's occupation profession. company character company customer associated , applicable. vehicle character type make vehicle customer owns drives. latitude double latitude customer's address. longitude double longitude customer's address.

title: Date Dimension Data from the Contonso Dataset — date
text: dataset contains date-related information used time-based analysis Contonso dataset. includes various representations date-related attributes, year, quarter, month, day, along indicators working days. useful time-series analysis aggregating data different time periods.

title: Date Dimension Data from the Contonso Dataset — date
Date Dimension Data from the Contonso Dataset — date
text: data frame 17 columns: date Date actual date record. date_key double Unique identifier date (often YYYYMMDD format). year double year part date. year_quarter character year quarter (e.g., "2025 Q1"). year_quarter_number double numerical representation quarter (e.g., 1, 2, 3, 4). quarter character quarter year (e.g., "Q1", "Q2"). year_month character year month (e.g., "2025-03"). year_month_short character shortened version year month (e.g., "2025 Mar"). year_month_number double numerical representation year-month (e.g., 202503 March 2025). month character month name (e.g., "March"). month_short character abbreviated month name (e.g., "Mar"). month_number double numerical representation month (e.g., 3 March). dayof_week character full name day week (e.g., "Monday"). dayof_week_short character abbreviated day week (e.g., "Mon"). dayof_week_number double numerical representation day week (e.g., 1 Monday). working_day double Indicator whether date working day (1 working day, 0 non-working day). working_day_number double numerical indicator working day (e.g., 1 working day, 0 non-working day).

title: Sales Data from the Contonso Dataset — sales
Sales Data from the Contonso Dataset — sales
text: data frame sales columns: order_key double Unique identifier order. line_number double Line number within order (multi-line orders). order_date Date Date order placed. delivery_date Date Date order delivered. customer_key double Unique identifier customer placed order. store_key double Unique identifier store order placed. product_key double Unique identifier product order. quantity double quantity product ordered. unit_price double price per unit product. net_price double total net price product, considering discounts. unit_cost double cost per unit product. currency_code character currency code used transaction (e.g., USD, EUR). exchange_rate double exchange rate applied currency, applicable. gross_revenue double product's unit_price multiplied quantity. net_revenue double product's net_price multiplied quantity. unit_discount double product's unit_price minute net_price. discounts double product's unit_discount multiplied quantity. cogs double product's unit_cost multiplied quantity. margin double product's net_revenue minus cogs. unit_margin double product margin divided quantity.
